com.snakybo.torch.component

Class MeshRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.snakybo.torch.object.TorchObject
      • com.snakybo.torch.object.Component
        • com.snakybo.torch.component.MeshRenderer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public final class MeshRenderer
extends Component

    A Mesh renderer.

    Renders a mesh with the specified material.

    Since:
    1.0
    See Also:
    Mesh, Material, Serialized Form

      • setMesh

        public final void setMesh(Mesh mesh)

        Set the Mesh.

        Setting a new mesh is relatively expensive, since it has to compute new vertex and index buffers.

        Parameters:
        mesh - The new mesh.
